document.full_text: western-led coalition forces bombarded civilian and military areas in the towns of khoms and arrujban on friday, libyan television said, quoting a military official.
document.title: coalition hit areas in khoms, arrujban: libyan tv
lines_and_colors: western-led coalition forces bombarded civilian and military areas in the towns of khoms and arrujban on friday, libyan television said, quoting a military official.
